content: Savings Bank Account OCBC 360 Asked by Bin RuiAsked on 05 Jun 2019If my wife and I were to transfer money to each other on a month to month basis, we will get a boost and step-up bonus. Is this an Ocbc 360 account "hack"?Assuming my wife & I have $20,000 in each of our OCBC 360 savings account. If she transfers all her $20,000 to me, I would get a Boost Bonus of $16.98 as well as $11.46 for Step-up Bonus (according to the 360 acccount interest calculator).Next month, I'll transfer all my $40,000 to her, she will then earn a Boost Bonus of $33.97 and $11.46 of Step-up Bonus. Can I repeat these steps for the subsequent months to get these bonuses? It's not big amount, but still it is consider a hack?1 answerAnswerBump0
